entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Spiritwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:16 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Spiritwood 04:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023
Temperature: -19.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -22.2°C
Wind: S 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy. Fog dissipating late this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023
